entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 5:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: ENE 54 km/h gust 74 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to rain this evening. Freezing rain inland and over higher terrain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers except freezing rain inland and over higher terrain early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with drizzle. Fog developing early in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
